rules.description: There must be exactly one space character on each side of a binary operator
There must be exactly one space character between the NOT operator and its argument
Warning to not use Begin..End to enclose simple statements
Warning that parenthesis should be added after function calls
The END, IF, REPEAT, UNTIL, FOR, WHILE, and CASE statement should always start a line
Warning of variable declaration order
Warning the name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
Text constants should have specific suffixes - Message (Msg), Token (Tok), Error (Err), Confirm/Str Memu (Qst), Label/Caption (Lbl), Text (Txt)
Warning about identifiers with quotes in the name
Warning of unused variable
Warning of possible text overflow error
Warning that a record is being retrieved but not used
Remember to specify either the 'OnAction' trigger or 'RunObject' property on an action
Warning that a global variable has the same name as another field, method or action in the same scope
Warning about Key fields
Obsoleted object must have a state 'Pending' or 'Removed' and a justification specifying why this field is being obsoleted
follow the style guide about best practices for naming
You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects
SIFT index should not be used on primary or unique key
You must specify a caption in the Caption property for Fields that exist on page objects
You can potentially increase performance if fields that are used in FlowFields are added to SumIndexedFields of the corresponding key
Use all lowercase letters for reserved language keywords
Do not use identical names for parameters and global variables
If you want to enable your application for multilanguage functionality, you must use the FieldCaption and TableCaption methods instead of the FieldName and TableName methods.
The CalcDate should only be used with DataFormula variables. Alternatively the string should be enclosed using the <> symbols
Provide an explanation that describes the content of each of the placeholders
Warning that a method is marked for removal in a future release
Warning about Key fields
Warning
The Web client does not support displaying the Request page of XMLPorts
Warning that the web client does not support both actions and fields in cue groups
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls containing Parts
A Blob cannot be used as a source expression for a page field
Warning that an action exists without an image
Warning that pages and reports need the UsageArea property to be searchable
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls that contain FlowFilter fields
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls in pages of type Card, Document, and ListPlus
